mapper.update: update web_task_execute_log set keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, web_task_id = #{webTaskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_url = #{currentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, success = #{success,jdbcType=BIT}, exception = #{exception,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, keyword, admin_id, create_time, web_task_id, current_url, ip, fee, domain, success, exception from web_task_execute_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, keyword, admin_id, create_time, web_task_id, current_url, ip, fee, domain, success, exception from web_task_execute_log
SELECT * FROM web_task_execute_log WHERE TO_DAYS(create_time) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) AND keyword=#{keyword} AND admin_id=#{id} order by create_time
SELECT * FROM web_task_execute_log WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(create_time) = 1 AND keyword=#{keyword} AND admin_id=#{id} ORDER BY create_time
SELECT * FROM web_task_execute_log WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(create_time) = 2 AND keyword=#{keyword} AND admin_id=#{id} ORDER BY create_time
select *, COUNT(id) as num, hour(create_time) as time FROM web_task_execute_log where admin_id=#{id} AND keyword=#{keyword} and TO_DAYS(create_time) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) group by hour(create_time)
select *, COUNT(id) as num, hour(create_time) as time FROM web_task_execute_log where admin_id=#{id} AND keyword=#{keyword} and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(create_time) = 1 group by hour(create_time)
select *, COUNT(id) as num, hour(create_time) as time FROM web_task_execute_log where admin_id=#{id} AND keyword=#{keyword} and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(create_time) = 2 group by hour(create_time)
